showRemovedFriends.name: Notify you if one of your friends removes you.
showRemovedFriends.description: Note that this will also notify you when you remove them from your friend list as there is no way to check who was performing the action.

showAnyMessages.name: Show any received messages in chat
showAnyMessages.description: Disabling this will completely hide received messages in chat.

showOwnMessages.name: Show your own sent messages in chat

request.incoming: %s just sent you a friend request!
request.empty: You don't have any incoming friend requests!
request.outEmpty: You don't have any outgoing friend requests!
request.notFound: There was no request found that matches your search!
request.autoDeclined: Incoming request by %s was automatically declined.

messages.notConnected: You're not connected to the LabyChat!
messages.markedRead: The message was marked as read.
messages.manual: This command can't be run manually!

remove.title: Friend removed!
remove.description: Either you removed %s as a friend or they removed you.
